title: Tiger Woods, Greg Norman, Ernie Els, Ben Hogan and Golf's Weirdest Injuries
headline: The Weirdest and Most Notable Injuries in Golf History
description: Greg Norman's chainsaw accident, Tiger Woods' injured elbow, Jesper Parvenik falling off a Segway and Lee Trevino being struck by lightning are only a few of golf's weirdest injuries. We compiled the 14 most memorable in golf history.
short_headline: The Weirdest and Most Notable Injuries in Golf History
page_title: Tiger Woods, Greg Norman, Ernie Els, Ben Hogan and Golf's Weirdest Injuries
slug: The Weirdest and Most Notable Injuries in Golf History
body: Greg Norman's chainsaw accident, Tiger Woods' injured elbow, Jesper Parvenik falling off a Segway and Lee Trevino being struck by lightning are only a few of golf's weirdest injuries. We compiled the 13 most memorable in golf history.
